item.description: Update Full River Rescue; INC#1553; 05:22PM; 2750 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zZvQoB; Boyle Heights; This incident has moved deep into the County of Los Angeles and Incident Command is transitioning to LA County Fire Department with LAFD Air Ops remaining on scene to assist. All LAFD ground resources are being released. For further updates, follow @lacofdpio . No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 BC705 CM20 CM22 E209 E21 E221 E25 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA2 SC1 SW44 SW89 T21 T9 UR88; CH5; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Full River Rescue; INC#1553; 05:10PM; 2750 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zZvQoB; Boyle Heights; Firefighters have confirmed an adult male patient in the water, moving downstream. The patient was seen passing Atlantic Ave and is moving downstream towards E Slauson Ave. LA County Fire Department is establishing additional rescue points downstream and LAFD River IC (incident command) is coordinating efforts with LACoFD. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 BC705 CM20 CM22 E209 E21 E221 E25 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA2 SC1 SW44 SW89 T21 T9 UR88; CH5; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Full River Rescue; INC#1553; 05:06PM; 2750 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zZvQoB; Boyle Heights; Bystanders report male patient seen in the water. Firefighters are in position but have not yet made visual contact with the patient. Rescue operations are being established downstream (Bandini Blvd x LA River) of the last known position of the patient. LA County Fire also has resources on scene. @ladofdpio Commuters are asked to avoid Bandini Blvd x S Downey Road due to emergency apparatus. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC5 BC705 CM20 CM22 E209 E21 E221 E25 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA2 SC1 SW44 SW89 T21 T9 UR88; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

CONCLUDED River Rescue; INC#0431; 08:46AM; Nb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EgdWQO; Cypress Park; After a thorough search from both air and ground, LAFD confirmed there are no victims in the water. All LAFD resources are being released and this incident is being transitioned to LA County Fire Department @lacofdpio (as it is deep into the City of Vernon) for any additional needs. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E13 E14 E201 E209 E21 E220 E226 EM11 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA814 SC1 SW44 SW88 T1 T20 T26 UA1 UA6 UR88; CH5; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Update River Rescue; INC#0431; 08:12AM; Nb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EgdWQO; Cypress Park; Both vehicles (white minivan and black sedan) appear to be unoccupied. Firefighters on the ground and helicopters now on scene are scouring the river to determine if there are any victims in the water. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E13 E14 E201 E209 E220 E226 EM11 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA814 SC1 SW44 SW88 T1 T20 T26 UA1 UA6 UR88; CH5; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Full River Rescue; INC#0431; 08:03AM; Nb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EgdWQO; Cypress Park; A full river rescue response is in place along pre-determined sites on the LA River. Two vehicles (one white and one black) have been seen in the moving water and just passed the Washington St Bridge - firefighters are working to get a visual to determine if there are any occupants (they have not seen anyone in them yet). There are not currently known victims. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:43AM ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E13 E14 E201 E209 E220 E226 EM11 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA814 SC1 SW44 SW88 T1 T20 T26 UR88; CH5; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - FIRE OUT; INC#0199; 04:24AM; 12319 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fFDb5H; Sun Valley; FIRE NOW OUT: At 4:06 AM, firefighters responded to a reported structure fire and upon arrival at the address, located a one story single family dwelling with heavy fire showing from the attic. Crews initiated an offensive operation and achieved a knockdown in 18 mins with no reported injuries. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E289 E77 E81 E89 RA77 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0832; 12:37PM; 2342 W Moss Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E5hHsb; Glassell Park; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes. The fire extended up into the attic of the single family dwelling. One person (age/gender unknown) was being evaluated for an unknown medical complaint and has not yet required transport to the hospital. The cause and $ loss is TBD. No further details.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E12 E203 E212 E55 E56 RA55 T12 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0832; 12:10PM; 2342 W Moss Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E5hHsb; Glassell Park; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and located fire in one room with possible attic extension. ; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E12 E203 E212 E55 E56 RA55 T12 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0416; 07:21AM; 1426 S Orange Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DFAM2P; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN:28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 13 minutes, containing it to the unit of origin. A search of the unit did not locate any occupants and there were no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E261 E294 E58 E68 RA58 RA858 T61 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
